SEARCH
Package ba.unsa.etf.rpr.business

Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
ba.unsa.etf.rpr.business.UserManager
public class UserManager extends Object
This is a Java class called "UserManager" that provides a set of methods for managing User objects. The class uses the DaoFactory to access the User DAO (Data Access Object) and perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on User objects. It also throws a HairsalonException in case of an error.
